org.takes.facets.hamcrest

Class HmRqHeader

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.hamcrest.BaseMatcher<T>
      • org.hamcrest.TypeSafeMatcher<Request>
        • org.takes.facets.hamcrest.HmRqHeader
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Matcher<Request>, SelfDescribing

    public final class HmRqHeader
extends TypeSafeMatcher<Request>
    Response Header Matcher.

    This "matcher" tests given response header.

    The header name(s) should be provided in lowercase.

    The class is immutable and thread-safe.

    Since:
    0.23.3
    Version:
    $Id: b062ad368f632e6a2c8ac2a6dcb8d9cbcd785724 $
    Author:
    Eugene Kondrashev (eugene.kondrashev@gmail.com)
    To do:
